Montgomery.Brewbaker Technology Magnet High School: Brewbaker Technology Magnet High School is an American high school that was honored by the Blue Ribbon Schools Program in 2009. Brewbaker serves students in grades 9 through 12. Brewbaker Technology Magnet High School opened in August 2000 as a product of a partnership between Montgomery County Public Schools, the Montgomery City Council, and the Montgomery Area Chamber of Commerce with funding from a series of federal and local grants.
